trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content of a list-view

seg-source.mrk: Scrolls the content of a list-view

target.mrk: Scrolls the content of a list-view

trans-unit.source: Value of type int that specifies the amount of horizontal scrolling in pixels.

seg-source.mrk: Value of type int that specifies the amount of horizontal scrolling in pixels.

target.mrk: Value of type int that specifies the amount of horizontal scrolling in pixels.

trans-unit.source: If the list-view control is in list-view, this value specifies the number of columns to scroll.

seg-source.mrk: If the list-view control is in list-view, this value specifies the number of columns to scroll.

target.mrk: If the list-view control is in list-view, this value specifies the number of columns to scroll.

trans-unit.source: Value of type int that specifies the amount of vertical scrolling in pixels

seg-source.mrk: Value of type int that specifies the amount of vertical scrolling in pixels

target.mrk: Value of type int that specifies the amount of vertical scrolling in pixels

trans-unit.source: When the list-view control is in report view, the control can only be scrolled vertically in whole line increments.

seg-source.mrk: When the list-view control is in report view, the control can only be scrolled vertically in whole line increments.

target.mrk: When the list-view control is in report view, the control can only be scrolled vertically in whole line increments.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the $iDY parameter will be rounded to the nearest number of pixels that form a whole line increment.

seg-source.mrk: Therefore, the $iDY parameter will be rounded to the nearest number of pixels that form a whole line increment.

target.mrk: Therefore, the $iDY parameter will be rounded to the nearest number of pixels that form a whole line increment.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the height of a line is 16 pixels and 8 is passed for $iDY, the list will be scrolled by 16 pixels (1 line).

seg-source.mrk: For example, if the height of a line is 16 pixels and 8 is passed for $iDY, the list will be scrolled by 16 pixels (1 line).

target.mrk: For example, if the height of a line is 16 pixels and 8 is passed for $iDY, the list will be scrolled by 16 pixels (1 line).

trans-unit.source: If 7 is passed for $iDY, the list will be scrolled 0 pixels (0 lines).

seg-source.mrk: If 7 is passed for $iDY, the list will be scrolled 0 pixels (0 lines).

target.mrk: If 7 is passed for $iDY, the list will be scrolled 0 pixels (0 lines).
